common.title: Ollie
common.subtitle: One of the first tricks to learn. The keystone of skateboarding, essential for linking other tricks. Practice your Ollie to build confidence and improve your skills.

common.title: FS 180 Ollie
common.subtitle: A 180-degree spin while performing an Ollie. Rotate your body and board in the frontside direction.

common.title: BS 180 Ollie
common.subtitle: Similar to the FS 180 Ollie but spinning in the backside direction.

common.title: Fakie FS 180 Ollie
common.subtitle: Perform a 180-degree spin while riding in the fakie stance (opposite direction).

common.title: Boneless
common.subtitle: Grab the board with your hand and jump off the ground. A fun and stylish trick.

common.title: Shuvit
common.subtitle: Rotate the board 180 degrees without popping it. A basic trick to add to your repertoire.

common.title: Pop Shuvit
common.subtitle: Similar to the Shuvit, but with a pop. Practice timing and coordination.

common.title: FS Pop Shuvit
common.subtitle: A frontside pop shuvit. Spin the board while popping it off the ground.

common.title: Manual
common.subtitle: Balance on two wheels without touching the ground. Requires control and stability.

common.title: FS 50-50
common.subtitle: Slide along a rail or ledge with both trucks. A fundamental grind trick.

frontside.title: FS 180
frontside.subtitle: The skater rotates the board 180 degrees in the air while turning their body frontside.

frontside.title: FS Pop Shove-it
frontside.subtitle: The skateboarder uses their front foot to spin the board 180 degrees horizontally while jumping.

frontside.title: FS 360 Ollie
frontside.subtitle: A full 360-degree rotation of the skateboard while performing an ollie (jump).

frontside.title: FS Boardslide
frontside.subtitle: Sliding along a rail or ledge with the board perpendicular to the obstacle, facing frontside.

frontside.title: FS Feeble Grind
frontside.subtitle: Grinding on a rail or ledge with the back truck while the front truck hangs over the edge.

frontside.title: FS Smith Grind
frontside.subtitle: Similar to the feeble grind, but the front truck grinds while the back truck hangs over the edge.

frontside.title: FS Nosegrind
frontside.subtitle: Grinding on the front truck while the tail of the board is lifted off the obstacle.

frontside.title: FS 50-50 Grind
frontside.subtitle: Balancing on both trucks while grinding along a rail or ledge.

frontside.title: FS Kickturn
frontside.subtitle: A quick 180-degree turn on the skateboard's front wheels while riding.

frontside.title: FS Boneless
frontside.subtitle: A trick where the skater removes their front foot, grabs the board, and jumps off the ground.

backside.title: BS 180
backside.subtitle: The skater rotates the board 180 degrees in the air while turning their body backside.

backside.title: BS Pop Shove-it
backside.subtitle: The skateboarder uses their back foot to spin the board 180 degrees horizontally while jumping.

backside.title: BS 360 Ollie
backside.subtitle: A full 360-degree rotation of the skateboard while performing an ollie (jump) in the backside direction.

backside.title: BS Boardslide
backside.subtitle: Sliding along a rail or ledge with the board perpendicular to the obstacle, facing backside.

backside.title: BS Tailslide
backside.subtitle: Grinding on the tail of the skateboard while sliding along a rail or ledge.

backside.title: BS Lipslide
backside.subtitle: Similar to the tailslide, but the skateboarder grinds on the side of the board (lip) instead of the tail.

backside.title: BS Nosegrind
backside.subtitle: Grinding on the front truck while the tail of the board is lifted off the obstacle, backside style.

backside.title: BS 50-50 Grind
backside.subtitle: Balancing on both trucks while grinding along a rail or ledge, facing backside.

backside.title: BS Revert
backside.subtitle: A quick 180-degree turn on the skateboard's back wheels while riding, rotating backside.

backside.title: BS Boneless
backside.subtitle: A trick where the skater removes their back foot, grabs the board, and jumps off the ground, backside style.

frontside.title: FS Flip
frontside.subtitle: A kickflip performed while rotating the board frontside (180 or 360 degrees). Requires precise footwork and timing.

frontside.title: FS 360 Flip
frontside.subtitle: A combination of a 360-degree spin and a kickflip, resulting in a full rotation while flipping the board.

frontside.title: FS Bluntslide
frontside.subtitle: Grinding on the tail of the skateboard while sliding along a rail or ledge, frontside.

frontside.title: FS Bigspin
frontside.subtitle: A 360-degree spin of the board while simultaneously performing a frontside shove-it.

frontside.title: FS Feeble to Fakie
frontside.subtitle: Grinding on a rail or ledge with the back truck, then transitioning into a fakie stance (riding backward).

frontside.title: FS Hurricane
frontside.subtitle: A variation of the boardslide where the skateboarder grinds on the side of the board (lip) while rotating frontside.

frontside.title: FS Inward Heelflip
frontside.subtitle: An inward heelflip performed while rotating frontside. Requires precise flick and catch.

frontside.title: FS Noseblunt
frontside.subtitle: Grinding on the front truck with the tail lifted off the obstacle, frontside style.

frontside.title: FS 540
frontside.subtitle: A challenging aerial trick involving a 540-degree spin while grabbing the board.

frontside.title: FS Nollie Heelflip
frontside.subtitle: A nollie heelflip performed frontside (from the nose of the board). Requires quick footwork.

backside.title: BS Flip
backside.subtitle: A kickflip performed while rotating the board backside (180 or 360 degrees). Requires precise footwork and timing.

backside.title: BS 360 Flip
backside.subtitle: A combination of a 360-degree spin and a kickflip, resulting in a full rotation while flipping the board.

backside.title: BS Bluntslide
backside.subtitle: Grinding on the tail of the skateboard while sliding along a rail or ledge, backside.

backside.title: BS Bigspin
backside.subtitle: A 360-degree spin of the board while simultaneously performing a backside shove-it.

backside.title: BS Feeble to Fakie
backside.subtitle: Grinding on a rail or ledge with the back truck, then transitioning into a fakie stance (riding backward).

backside.title: BS Hurricane
backside.subtitle: A variation of the boardslide where the skateboarder grinds on the side of the board (lip) while rotating backside.

backside.title: BS Inward Heelflip
backside.subtitle: An inward heelflip performed while rotating backside. Requires precise flick and catch.

backside.title: BS Noseblunt
backside.subtitle: Grinding on the front truck with the tail lifted off the obstacle, backside style.

backside.title: BS 540
backside.subtitle: A challenging aerial trick involving a 540-degree spin while grabbing the board.

backside.title: BS Nollie Heelflip
backside.subtitle: A nollie heelflip performed backside (from the nose of the board). Requires quick footwork.
